channel.title: Ensemble averaging on Artur L Gower
channel.description: Recent content in Ensemble averaging on Artur L Gower

item.title: Multiple Waves Propagate in Random Particulate Materials
item.description: To the right of the dashed line are particles, whose position has been numerically ensemble averaged. To the left is just a homogenious medium. What is shown here (though faintly) is that more than one transmitted wave exists in an ensemble averaged medium. The paper shows this with much more clarity!

item.title: Reflection from a multi-species material and its transmitted effective wavenumber
